title: Jessie-May Morgan Joins Velo and Pinkbike’s Tech Team!
content:
Velo's newest member is based in Scotland and will be covering gear and tech news for both Velo and Pinkbike beginning this week.

Read the full article at Jessie-May Morgan Joins Velo and Pinkbike’s Tech Team! on Velo.
author: Brad Roe
